Package org.waarp.openr66.context

Classes implementing Session, Result and ErrorCode

See:
          Description


Interface Summary
R66BusinessFactoryInterface  
R66BusinessInterface  
 

Class Summary
R66DefaultBusinessFactory Empty Business factory
R66Result This class is the result for every operations in OpenR66.
R66Session The global object session in OpenR66, a session by local channel
 

Enum Summary
ErrorCode This enum class keeps all code that will be returned into the result and store (char representation) into the runner.
R66FiniteDualStates Finite Dual State Machine for OpenR66 (Requester=R, requesteD=D, Sender=S, Receive=R)
